# Files and patterns to ignore for GitHub Copilot suggestions

# Logs and temporary files
*.log
tmp/
log/

# Compiled assets
public/assets/
public/packs/
node_modules/

# Database files
*.sqlite3
*.sqlite3-journal

# Environment and secrets
.env*
config/master.key
config/credentials/*.key

# Generated files
Gemfile.lock
yarn.lock
package-lock.json

# Coverage and test artifacts
coverage/
spec/examples.txt
tmp/capybara/

# IDE and editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Vendor directories
vendor/bundle/
vendor/cache/

# Documentation
docs/api/
CHANGELOG.md

# Third-party configurations
.rubocop_todo.yml
